text:
Sorry for the sudden interruption,
Meguru-chan. Isn't this your handkerchief?

Yes! Thank you, Chiyuki-san!
I was just looking for it!

That's a relief...
It was lying in the hallway leading to the laundry area.

It's such a lovely handkerchief.
I'm glad I could return it to its owner.

Oh... Maybe it got dirty when I was doing the laundry...
Chiyuki-san, did you go out of your way to find the owner?

Well, I happened to see Meguru-chan using it before...
and I thought it had a nice design.

When I see pretty sundries,
I just can't help but notice them.

I couldn't find it anywhere, and I was about
to empty out all my packed belongings.

Hehe, it's the last day, so it's a bit nostalgic, right?
If you want, I can help you pack?

Ah, But...
the handkerchief got dirty when it fell...

Well, that's to be expected...
I'll put it in a bag or something and take it back!

Then I'll go find a suitable bag.
Meguru-chan, you can start packing.

Wow! I'm really sorry and thankful!
I'll gladly accept your offer! Thank you so much!
